items.content_html: A lightweight JavaScript plugin that automatically inserts invisible line breaks between Chinese and English characters to improve text readability in mixed-language content. Perfect for web pages that feature CJK (Chinese, Japanese, Korean) and English text, ensuring a clean and user-friendly layout.
items.title: martinSCS/ZhEnTextFormatter: A lightweight JavaScript plugin that automatically inserts invisible line breaks between Chinese and English characters to improve text readability in mixed-language content. Perfect for web pages that feature CJK (Chinese, Japanese, Korean) and English text, ensuring a clean and user-friendly layout.
